original_title: My Friends Tigger & Pooh: Everyone is Special
overview: Join the Super Sleuths as they gear up for fun-filled adventures that celebrate being true to yourself. Cheer for Darby as she learns to ride her bike. Help Tigger find one-of-a-kind treasures for his new museum and much more! You'll soon discover that although everybody may seem different, there's something important that we all have in common: Everyone Is Special!  Episodes Comprise: 1. Turtle comes out of his shell / Darby's wheelie big problem 2. Tigger's day at the you-see-um / Skunk's non-scents 3. An impossumible case / Darby saurus
title: My Friends Tigger & Pooh: Everyone is Special
